name: rgb() & hsl() CSS colors
description: Finds rgb(), rgba(), hsl(), & hsla() CSS colors and returns type, alpha, and value.
content:
This will find rgb() and hsl() CSS color definitions, and return the important elements. It doesn't validate the value, as that's generally easier / more appropriate to parse via code.

rgba(255.2, -20, 0, .999)
rgb(255.2, -20, 0)
hsla(255.2, -20, 0, .999)
hsl(1,1,1)
author: Grant Skinner
